layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x64
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x64
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x48 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 748x48 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 746x46
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 746x20
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 227x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 108x16
                text run at (2,2) width 108: "R1C1 colspan=0"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (231,2) size 513x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 108x16
                text run at (2,2) width 108: "R1C2 colspan=0"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,24) size 746x20
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,24) size 742x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=2]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 108x16
